This pool holds the Guinness Book of World Records title...
Opened in 2006 at the San Alfonso del Mar Resort on the Pacific coast of Chile,...
...this pool, or more accurately speaking, man-made lagoon...
...was designed by Fernando Fischmann of Crystal Lagoons Corporation...
...and took over five years to construct.
The pool is a staggering 3,323 feet long.
It has a surface area of 20 acres and holds 66 million gallons of salt water.
With a maximum depth of 115 feet,...
...it is also one of the deepest pools in the world.
